findings.paradox_evidence: User requesting PDF and script repeatedly without clear end goal
filter_failure_examples: Mixing credit application language with script creation
Unable to specify precise script requirements
over_provisioning_patterns: Offering comprehensive PDF with extensive sections
Providing syntax corrections without user request
findings.cycle_progression: Information demands escalate from generic guidance to specific PDF creation without clear resolution
key_quotes: Practice reading these responses out loud
Creating a comprehensive call script PDF
Make a pdf for me with everything I need to say
findings.intervention_opportunity: Clarify specific script requirements before generating comprehensive document

findings.paradox_evidence: User repeatedly asks for more information despite receiving comprehensive answers

Missing key details in previous explanations
Unable to synthesize information from multiple responses
findings.cycle_progression: Information requests become increasingly demanding and less focused, with mounting user frustration

Go into Google again!
For fuck sake Claude
